title: Acayip Hikayeler
overview: Acayip Hikayeler is a TV show which is adapted from Galip Tekin's comics.Hayko Cepkin narrates each episode and every episode the cast and plot changes. Each episode begins and ends with Hayko Cepkin's "judgment". In starting judgment Hayko Cepkin tells what is the story about and in the end judgement he simply tells the moral of the story.
